text: Mu by’ukuri, guhindagura amezi matagatifu asimbuzwa atari yo59 ni ukongera ubuhakanyi. Ibyo (Shitani) abiyobesha babandi bahakanye, kuko bayazirura mu mwaka umwe mu wundi bakayaziririza kugira ngo bahuze n’umubare w’ayo Allah yaziririje; ubwo bakaba baziruye ibyo Allah yaziririje. Bakundishijwe ibikorwa byabo bibi. Kandi Allah ntayobora abantu b’abahakanyi
